definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be modest, humble (perhaps prop. be retired, NH Hiph. keep close, reserve, preserve, so Targum [[אַחְנַע]]; [[חְנִיעַ]] retiring, modest);—

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Inf. abs. [[הַחְנֵעַ לֶכֶת]] Mic 6:8 a making humble to walk = shewing a humble walk (with God).
